about_the_game:
Pirate Survivors is a Roguelite Bullet heaven that focuses on movement and infinite upgrades.

Navigate treacherous seas swarming with relentless monsters, arm yourself with powerful items and defeat enough Sea Legends to rid of the monsters for good!

But beware - each time you grow stronger, so do your enemies! Make your choices wisely or risk being overwhelmed by the evolving monstrosities that lurk in the depths.

Unlock Powerful Upgrades & New Ships:

With each run, plunder treasure to permanently enhance your ship. Complete daring challenges to unlock new items and ships for future runs. Max out your permanent upgrades and discover every possible combination to push your survivability to the limit!

Conquer the Sea Legends:

You decide when to face the deadly Sea Legends, but delay too long and you will not be able to hold off the hoard of monsters, Only those brave enough to take on all three Legends will unlock the final, ultimate challenge. Defeat them, and gain access to even more perilous depths where only the strongest can survive.

Credits:

Trailer music by Otto Halmén.

short_description: Pirate Survivors is a fast-paced Roguelite where you battle endless waves of sea monsters, unlock powerful upgrades, and take on deadly Sea Legends. Choose your ship, conquer countless enemies, and face escalating challenges in this high-stakes Bullet Heaven adventure!
